code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{TextField,Button,Typography,Container,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DataUploadPage=()=>{const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[namespace,setNamespace]=useState('');const handleUpload=async()=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);formData.append('namespace',namespace);try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/upload_ttl',formData);alert(response.data.text);}catch(error){console.error(error);alert('Error uploading TTL file');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{mt:5,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Data Upload"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0]),style:{marginBottom:'16px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Namespace",variant:"outlined",value:namespace,onChange:e=>setNamespace(e.target.value),margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:handleUpload,fullWidth:true,children:"Upload TTL"})]})});};export default DataUploadPage;
